title: nn.Embedding padding_idx with custom initialization does not work as expected
body_html:
When initializing nn.Embedding with a padding_idx but then overwriting weights with some custom initialization, padding_idx no longer has any effect since the weights at that position are overridden. One would intuitively expect padding_idx to be handled on a higher level and always produce 0 embeddings for padding elements, rather than only during the weight initialization.

This seems dangerous and counterintuitive. Can we make padding_idx work properly, or at least document this in a very visible way?

See #1812 where somebody thought it was a bug
